alert.note: Alert for Telfair; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 2:36PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Telfair and southwestern Wheeler Counties through 315 PM EST... At 235 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Workmore, or 8 miles southwest of McRae, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... McRae, Lumber City, Scotland, Jacksonville, Towns, China Hill, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, Jordan and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central Georgia.
